Content-Type: text/plain; charset=US-ASCII
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

This is a bug in 0.10.  It's fixed in CVS, and it also worked correctly
in 0.8.1. 
Andy Boyko   aboy@...
 
 

>>> reger@... 7/7/2004 1:55:05 PM >>>

I noticed yesterday that it was re-fetching pages that had # bookmarks
in them, i.e. it grabbed:

http://www.site.com/randompage.html
http://www.site.com/randompage.html#bookmark1
http://www.site.com/randompage.html#bookmark2

which resulted in having 3 copies of randompage.html in the ARC file.

Is there a setting or something else that can be done so the crawler
only grabs one copy of a file?

Thanks,
Rob Eger
Aptas, Inc.







Yahoo! Groups Links
